properties.areaDesc: Waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 22 at 2:19PM EST until January 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northeast winds 20 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and seas 10 to 14 feet. For the Small Craft
Advisory, east winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 7 to 12 feet expected.

* WHERE...Southeast Georgia and Northeast Florida coastal waters
from Altamaha Sound GA to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 10 PM EST this evening. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 7 PM EST
Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY
